description: Jeff Hammond's last pick-up is young Drew Kelley and his prom date. Little did Drew know he was dating Miss Goody Two-Shoes who spoils his plans at the end of the night, leaving him frustrated and horny. Jeff lends the young man an ear and then some more. After downing a few drinks the sly chauffeur shows the frisky blond how to make the most of a free ride as they careen from sucking to rimming and then to fucking.
title: Driving Hard
